skills.name: ng-no-rerenders
skills.description: Detects and eliminates unnecessary Angular change detection cycles: Default vs OnPush, zone.js over-triggering, signals vs BehaviorSubject cost, missing trackBy in lists, and heavy template expressions. Trigger: When user reports Angular performance issues, CD errors, or excess re-renders.

skills.name: ng-solid-dry-kiss
skills.description: Applies SOLID, DRY, and KISS principles to Angular TypeScript: single responsibility services, open/closed directives, dependency inversion via InjectionToken, eliminating duplicated interceptors and resolvers, and avoiding over-engineering. Trigger: When user asks to refactor, review, or architect clean Angular code.

skills.name: skill-creator
skills.description: Creates new skills for monorepo-skills or improves existing ones following repo conventions: correct frontmatter format, single-responsibility content, trigger clauses, and placement in the correct technology folder. Trigger: When user wants to add a skill, capture a workflow, or refine a SKILL.md.

skills.name: rn-no-rerenders
skills.description: Detects and eliminates unnecessary re-renders in React Native: inline objects/arrays/functions in JSX, broken memo, unstable useCallback/useMemo deps, FlatList row churn, derived state, and context over-broadcasting. Trigger: When user reports re-renders, flickering, FlatList jank, or wants to optimize rendering performance.

skills.name: rn-solid-dry-kiss
skills.description: Applies SOLID, DRY, and KISS principles to React Native TypeScript: single responsibility components, open/closed hooks, dependency inversion via props/context, eliminating duplicated logic, and keeping implementations simple over clever. Trigger: When user asks to refactor, review, or write clean React Native code.
